item.title: 巴西政府反击假新闻对总统卢拉声望的威胁
item.description: 巴西政府正准备发起一场运动，以反击有关流行的即时支付系统的假新闻的传播，该系统损害了路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦总统的声誉。【原文：Brazil’s government is preparing a campaign to fight back against the spread of fake news regarding a popular instant payment system that has damaged President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva’s reputation.】

item.title: 在法国的要求下，欧盟将削减 ESG 报告规则
item.description: 欧盟可能会缩减其备受争议的环境、社会和公司治理报告要求，因为法国准备公布一项正式提案，寻求限制监管框架的范围。【原文：The European Union is likely to scale back its highly contested ESG reporting requirements, as France prepares to unveil a formal proposal seeking to limit the scope of the regulatory framework.】

item.title: 特朗普发出即将加征关税的信号，卢布逼近科维时代低点
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普发表讲话，表示将很快对美国邻国征收关税后，加元跌至近五年来最弱。【原文：The Canadian dollar fell to its weakest in nearly five years following remarks from US President Donald Trump, who indicated that he would soon impose tariffs on the US’s neighbors.】

item.title: 特鲁多称特朗普的关税政策旨在制造混乱
item.description: 加拿大总理贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）说，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普正试图在其贸易伙伴中制造不确定性，以打击它们的平衡，削弱它们在贸易谈判中的地位。【原文：US President Donald Trump is trying to create uncertainty in his trading partners to knock them off-balance and weaken their negotiating position on trade, Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau said.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁扩大美加石油库存差距
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统一再威胁要对加拿大和其他友好国家征收高额关税，这使得多伦多的一些石油和天然气股票成为全球表现最差的股票。【原文：President Donald Trump’s repeated threats to slap steep tariffs on Canada and other friendly nations have left Toronto with some of the world’s worst-performing oil and gas stocks.】

item.title: 特朗普承诺对墨西哥征收 25% 的关税令比索下挫
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统发誓要征收严厉的关税之后，墨西哥比索暴跌，再次引发了交易商对该国将在未来四年内成为目标的担忧。【原文：The Mexican peso tumbled after President Donald Trump vowed to impose stiff tariffs, reigniting fears among traders that the nation will become a target over the next four years.】

item.title: 泽连斯基在达沃斯欢迎特朗普呼吁提升美国能源影响力
item.description: 乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelenskiy）认为，在唐纳德-特朗普就职典礼上承诺扩大美国能源出口后，乌克兰的发展方向是正确的。【原文：Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy sees things going in the right direction for his nation after Donald Trump’s inaugural pledge to expand US energy exports.】

item.title: HPE 正在调查漏洞索赔，称未造成业务影响
item.description: 惠普企业公司（Hewlett Packard Enterprise Co.【原文：Hewlett Packard Enterprise Co. says it’s investigating a potential cyber incident from a hacking gang that’s also breached other technology giants.】

item.title: 德国商业银行首席执行官奥尔洛普表示正在考虑 "附加 "交易
item.description: 德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）首席执行官贝蒂娜-奥洛普（Bettina Orlopp）表示，德国商业银行正在关注各种潜在的小型交易，以便为股东创造价值，但不会做任何 "愚蠢 "的事情来抵御意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）的潜在收购。【原文：Commerzbank AG has its eyes on various potential smaller deals to create value for shareholders, but it won’t do anything “stupid” to fend off a potential takeover by UniCredit SpA, Chief Executive Officer Bettina Orlopp said.】

item.title: 贝莱德与温斯坦在封闭式基金问题上达成和解
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）达成协议，回购旗下两只最大封闭式基金的股份，此前 Boaz Weinstein 的 Saba Capital Management 发起了一场长达数年的运动，认为这两只基金表现不佳，损害了投资者的利益。【原文：BlackRock Inc. reached an agreement to repurchase shares of two of its largest closed-end funds, following a multiyear campaign by Boaz Weinstein’s Saba Capital Management arguing the vehicles performed poorly and harmed investors.】

item.title: 价值 3 亿美元的俄罗斯超级游艇的命运成为美国审判的主题
item.description: 美国周二在法庭上辩称，一名受制裁的亿万富翁是美国扣押的一艘超级游艇的所有者，现在必须没收这艘游艇，因为美国政府正在追讨乌克兰战争幕后操纵者俄罗斯富豪的资产。【原文：The US goes to court Tuesday to argue that a sanctioned billionaire is the owner of a superyacht it seized and must now forfeit it, as the government goes after the assets of wealthy Russians behind the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 葡萄牙希望减少从俄罗斯进口天然气的份额
item.description: 葡萄牙能源与环境部长玛丽亚-达格拉萨-卡瓦略（Maria da Graca Carvalho）表示，葡萄牙希望进一步减少从俄罗斯获得的天然气供应份额。【原文：Portugal hopes to further decrease the share of natural gas supplies it gets from Russia, Energy and Environment Minister Maria da Graca Carvalho said.】

item.title: 航运巨头地中海航运公司称目前将继续避开红海
item.description: 地中海航运公司（MSC Mediterranean Shipping Co.南非表示，在另行通知之前，该公司将继续派船绕行非洲南端，这表明通过红海恢复正常贸易流动并非迫在眉睫。【原文：Container liner MSC Mediterranean Shipping Co. SA said it will continue to send its ships around Africa’s southern tip until further notice, a sign that any resumption to normal trade flows through the Red Sea is not imminent.】

item.title: 安哥拉将关键利率维持在19.5%，以抑制通胀高企
item.description: 由于担心两位数的通货膨胀，安哥拉中央银行连续第四次维持借贷成本不变。【原文：Angola’s central bank kept borrowing costs unchanged for the fourth consecutive time over concerns about double-digit inflation.】

item.title: 旅游应用 Hopper 着眼于长期 IPO 计划，估值达 100 亿美元
item.description: 旅游数据提供商 Hopper Inc. 是加拿大最大的紧密型技术公司之一，其创始人认为该公司的上市价值将高达 100 亿美元。【原文：Travel data provider Hopper Inc., one of Canada’s largest closely held technology companies, is eyeing a public listing that its founder believes will value the business at as much as $10 billion.】

item.title: 软银支持的鱼类初创公司被指伪造大部分销售额
item.description: 印度尼西亚最著名的初创公司之一 EFishery Pte 可能在过去几年中虚报了收入和利润，而这一内部调查是由一名举报人对该公司的会计问题提出的指控引发的。【原文：EFishery Pte, one of Indonesia’s most prominent startups, may have inflated its revenue and profit over several years, according to an internal investigation triggered by a whistleblower’s claim about the company’s accounting.】

item.title: 谢因鲍姆说：墨西哥必须对特朗普的命令保持冷静
item.description: 克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆总统呼吁墨西哥人阅读唐纳德-特朗普周一签署的有关移民和贸易的行政命令的详细内容，同时重申她对移民和本国公民的支持。【原文：President Claudia Sheinbaum called on Mexicans to read the fine print of executive orders on immigration and trade that Donald Trump signed Monday, while reiterating her support for migrants and citizens of her nation.】

item.title: Paytm 创始人夏尔马期待银行重返商业领域
item.description: Paytm 的创始人希望他的银行能从印度监管机构获得新生，此前他已将该公司从他更大的金融科技帝国中剥离出来。【原文：Paytm’s founder expects his bank to get a fresh lease on life from Indian regulators, after he distanced that company from his larger fintech empire.】

item.title: Grindr 计划在人工智能推送中提供聊天摘要和新发现功能
item.description: Grindr Inc. 发布了其旗舰约会应用的几项重大更新，其中许多都采用了人工智能技术，以推动用户参与和收入增长。【原文：Grindr Inc. unveiled several major updates to its flagship dating app, many of them powered by artificial intelligence, in a bid to drive user engagement and revenue growth.】

item.title: 纳格尔称欧洲央行将在年中接近通胀目标
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，到 2025 年中期，欧洲中央银行应能接近其 2% 的通胀目标，从而能够将利率降至不再对经济构成压力的水平。【原文：The European Central Bank should be close to its 2% inflation goal by mid-2025, allowing it to lower interest rates to levels that no longer weigh on the economy, according to Governing Council member Joachim Nagel.】

item.title: 印度关系受挫，孟加拉国希望加深与中国的关系
item.description: 孟加拉国正计划与中国和其他东亚经济体建立更紧密的经济联系，而此时与印度的关系仍然紧张。【原文：Bangladesh is planning to build closer economic ties with China, and other East Asian economies, at a time when the relationship with India remains strained.】

item.title: 赢得欧盟支持后，法国财政部长确认赤字之路
item.description: 法国财政部长埃里克-隆巴德（Eric Lombard）表示，他的削减赤字方案得到了布鲁塞尔方面的支持，这对试图通过大规模削减开支来修复公共财政的法国政府来说是一个鼓舞。【原文：French Finance Minister Eric Lombard said he secured support from Brussels for his deficit-reduction path, in a boost for the government as it tries to push through massive spending cuts to repair public finances.】

item.title: 特鲁多减免销售税，加拿大通胀率降至 1.8
item.description: 自 2019 年以来，加拿大通胀率首次全年保持在央行的目标范围内，这是决策者在潜在关税战可能破坏其进展之前取得的一项成就。【原文：For the first time since 2019, Canadian inflation stayed within the central bank’s target range for a full year, a mark of achievement for policymakers ahead of a potential tariff war that threatens to derail their progress.】

item.title: 特朗普上任第一天的最新情况
item.description: 1月20日，华盛顿，唐纳德-特朗普在白宫椭圆形办公室签署行政命令时发表讲话。摄影师：Jim Lo Scalzo/EPA/Bloomberg【原文：Donald Trump speaks while signing executive orders in the Oval Office of the White House in Washington, DC, on Jan. 20. Photographer: Jim Lo Scalzo/EPA/Bloomberg】

item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is preparing to promote a slate of star executives to run its biggest Wall Street business lines, spotlighting the firm’s next generation of leadership.】

item.title: 微策略公司在股票投票前购买 11 亿美元比特币
item.description: 微策略公司（MicroStrategy Inc.【原文：MicroStrategy Inc. bought $1.1 billion of Bitcoin, as the company gears up for a shareholder vote on a 30 times increase its authorized Class A shares.】

item.title: 塔尔平斯的对冲基金返还 60 亿美元，主要用于管理现金
item.description: 杰夫-塔尔平斯（Jeff Talpins）的宏观交易对冲基金 Element Capital Management 去年返还了 60 多亿美元，缩小了资产规模，更接近于主要管理内部资金。【原文：Jeff Talpins’ macro trading hedge fund Element Capital Management returned more than $6 billion last year, shrinking its asset base and stepping closer to managing mostly internal money.】

item.title: 5 亿美元的 ETF 将成为减税趋势中的下一个重大举措
item.description: 一家总部位于密苏里州的财富管理公司准备加入这个规模虽小但却日益壮大的行列，将资产转入交易所交易基金，以帮助投资者减少税费支出，并准备推出规模最大的同类产品之一。【原文：A Missouri-based wealth manager is poised to join the small but growing list of firms who have flipped assets into exchange-traded funds to help investors slash their tax bills, prepping one of the largest launches of its kind.】

item.title: 美国制裁开始抑制油轮，俄罗斯石油运输陷入停滞
item.description:
截至1月19日的七天内，装运量下降，使四周流量连续第四周低于每天300万桶

。【原文：

A decline in shipments in the seven days to Jan. 19 kept four-week flows below 3 million barrels a day for a fourth week

】

item.description:
该行业正在争分夺秒地大量采购对能源转型至关重要的商品。【原文：

The industry is racing to bulk up on commodities crucial to the energy transition.

】
